title: Federal judge rules impeachment inquiry is legal
text: A Federal Judge has handed the Democrats a significant victory, coming at the end of an eventful week -- what appears to be a steady march toward articles of impeachment. The President responds to criticism that his team may not be up to the challenge by saying: there's no team, it’s just him. An accidental phone call from Rudy's phone to a reporter that left a message no one was supposed to hear, it has to do with the Bidens and Rudy's quest to make money. Geoff Bennett, Carol Leonnig, and Philip Elliott join Brian Williams.
